location.title: The Perfect Location
location.description: Thalea Palermo Apartment is located in the historic center of Palermo, surrounded by historic monuments, typical restaurants, and characteristic shops. Its strategic location allows you to explore the city on foot.

footer.brandDescription: Experience Palermo with the comfort of home, just steps away from historical wonders.

terrace.title: Terrace
terrace.description: Enjoy a relaxing moment on our spacious terrace overlooking the rooftops of Palermo, perfect for an outdoor breakfast or sunset aperitif.

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.description: A modern and fully equipped kitchen, designed to make you feel at home.

bedroom.title: Bedroom
bedroom.description: Comfortable bedroom with a double bed, soft lights, and elegant furnishings for a perfect rest.

bathroom.title: Bathroom

nearby.title: Nearby ThƒÉlƒìa
nearby.subtitle: Discover the most beautiful and historic places surrounding our apartment

places.title: Quattro Canti
places.description: The beating heart of Palermo, Quattro Canti square is a magnificent example of Sicilian Baroque. Here intersect the four main streets of the city, surrounded by splendid decorated facades.

places.title: San Giovanni degli Eremiti
places.description: A gem of Norman architecture, famous for its red domes and the peaceful atmosphere of its gardens. An ideal place to immerse yourself in Palermo's millennial history.

places.title: Piazza Pretoria
places.description: Famous for its monumental fountain, Piazza Pretoria is a symbol of the city. Marble statues and surrounding architecture create a suggestive and romantic atmosphere.

places.title: Palermo Cathedral
places.description: An imposing building that blends Arab, Norman, and Gothic styles. The Cathedral dominates Palermo's skyline with its towers and millennial history, witness to the many cultures that influenced the city.
